00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 
00039 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00040 
00041 /* NB: add /proc interfaces in upcoming patches */
00042 int portal_rotor = LNET_PTL_ROTOR_HASH_RT;
00043 module_param(portal_rotor, int, 0644);
00044 MODULE_PARM_DESC(portal_rotor, "redirect PUTs to different cpu-partitions");
00045 
00046 static int
00047 lnet_ptl_match_type(unsigned int index, lnet_process_id_t match_id,
00048                     __u64 mbits, __u64 ignore_bits)
00049 {
00050         struct lnet_portal      *ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[index];
00051         int                     unique;
00052 
00053         unique = ignore_bits == 0 &&
00054                  match_id.nid != LNET_NID_ANY &&
00055                  match_id.pid != LNET_PID_ANY;
00056 
00057         LASSERT(!lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) || !lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl));
00058 
00059         /* prefer to check w/o any lock */
00060         if (likely(lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) || lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl)))
00061                 goto match;
00062 
00063         /* unset, new portal */
00064         lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00065         /* check again with lock */
00066         if (unlikely(lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) || lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl))) {
00067                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00068                 goto match;
00069         }
00070 
00071         /* still not set */
00072         if (unique)
00073                 lnet_ptl_setopt(ptl, LNET_PTL_MATCH_UNIQUE);
00074         else
00075                 lnet_ptl_setopt(ptl, LNET_PTL_MATCH_WILDCARD);
00076 
00077         lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00078 
00079         return 1;
00080 
00081  match:
00082         if ((lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) && !unique) ||
00083             (lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl) && unique))
00084                 return 0;
00085         return 1;
00086 }
00087 
00088 static void
00089 lnet_ptl_enable_mt(struct lnet_portal *ptl, int cpt)
00090 {
00091         struct lnet_match_table *mtable = ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00092         int                     i;
00093 
00094         /* with hold of both lnet_res_lock(cpt) and lnet_ptl_lock */
00095         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl));
00096 
00097         mtable->mt_enabled = 1;
00098 
00099         ptl->ptl_mt_maps[ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps] = cpt;
00100         for (i = ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00101                 LASSERT(ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i] != cpt);
00102                 if (ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i] < cpt)
00103                         break;
00104 
00105                 /* swap to order */
00106                 ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i + 1] = ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i];
00107                 ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i] = cpt;
00108         }
00109 
00110         ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps++;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void
00114 lnet_ptl_disable_mt(struct lnet_portal *ptl, int cpt)
00115 {
00116         struct lnet_match_table *mtable = ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00117         int                     i;
00118 
00119         /* with hold of both lnet_res_lock(cpt) and lnet_ptl_lock */
00120         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl));
00121 
00122         if (LNET_CPT_NUMBER == 1)
00123                 return; /* never disable the only match-table */
00124 
00125         mtable->mt_enabled = 0;
00126 
00127         LASSERT(ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps > 0 &&
00128                 ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps <= LNET_CPT_NUMBER);
00129 
00130         /* remove it from mt_maps */
00131         ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps--;
00132         for (i = 0; i < ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps; i++) {
00133                 if (ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i] >= cpt) /* overwrite it */
00134                         ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i] = ptl->ptl_mt_maps[i + 1];
00135         }
00136 }
00137 
00138 static int
00139 lnet_try_match_md(lnet_libmd_t *md,
00140                   struct lnet_match_info *info, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00141 {
00142         /* ALWAYS called holding the lnet_res_lock, and can't lnet_res_unlock;
00143          * lnet_match_blocked_msg() relies on this to avoid races */
00144         unsigned int    offset;
00145         unsigned int    mlength;
00146         lnet_me_t       *me = md->md_me;
00147 
00148         /* MD exhausted */
00149         if (lnet_md_exhausted(md))
00150                 return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE | LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED;
00151 
00152         /* mismatched MD op */
00153         if ((md->md_options & info->mi_opc) == 0)
00154                 return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00155 
00156         /* mismatched ME nid/pid? */
00157         if (me->me_match_id.nid != LNET_NID_ANY &&
00158             me->me_match_id.nid != info->mi_id.nid)
00159                 return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00160 
00161         if (me->me_match_id.pid != LNET_PID_ANY &&
00162             me->me_match_id.pid != info->mi_id.pid)
00163                 return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00164 
00165         /* mismatched ME matchbits? */
00166         if (((me->me_match_bits ^ info->mi_mbits) & ~me->me_ignore_bits) != 0)
00167                 return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00168 
00169         /* Hurrah! This _is_ a match; check it out... */
00170 
00171         if ((md->md_options & LNET_MD_MANAGE_REMOTE) == 0)
00172                 offset = md->md_offset;
00173         else
00174                 offset = info->mi_roffset;
00175 
00176         if ((md->md_options & LNET_MD_MAX_SIZE) != 0) {
00177                 mlength = md->md_max_size;
00178                 LASSERT(md->md_offset + mlength <= md->md_length);
00179         } else {
00180                 mlength = md->md_length - offset;
00181         }
00182 
00183         if (info->mi_rlength <= mlength) {      /* fits in allowed space */
00184                 mlength = info->mi_rlength;
00185         } else if ((md->md_options & LNET_MD_TRUNCATE) == 0) {
00186                 /* this packet _really_ is too big */
00187                 CERROR("Matching packet from %s, match "LPU64
00188                        " length %d too big: %d left, %d allowed\n",
00189                        libcfs_id2str(info->mi_id), info->mi_mbits,
00190                        info->mi_rlength, md->md_length - offset, mlength);
00191 
00192                 return LNET_MATCHMD_DROP;
00193         }
00194 
00195         /* Commit to this ME/MD */
00196         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Incoming %s index %x from %s of "
00197                "length %d/%d into md "LPX64" [%d] + %d\n",
00198                (info->mi_opc == LNET_MD_OP_PUT) ? "put" : "get",
00199                info->mi_portal, libcfs_id2str(info->mi_id), mlength,
00200                info->mi_rlength, md->md_lh.lh_cookie, md->md_niov, offset);
00201 
00202         lnet_msg_attach_md(msg, md, offset, mlength);
00203         md->md_offset = offset + mlength;
00204 
00205         if (!lnet_md_exhausted(md))
00206                 return LNET_MATCHMD_OK;
00207 
00208         /* Auto-unlink NOW, so the ME gets unlinked if required.
00209          * We bumped md->md_refcount above so the MD just gets flagged
00210          * for unlink when it is finalized. */
00211         if ((md->md_flags & LNET_MD_FLAG_AUTO_UNLINK) != 0)
00212                 lnet_md_unlink(md);
00213 
00214         return LNET_MATCHMD_OK | LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED;
00215 }
00216 
00217 static struct lnet_match_table *
00218 lnet_match2mt(struct lnet_portal *ptl, lnet_process_id_t id, __u64 mbits)
00219 {
00220         if (LNET_CPT_NUMBER == 1)
00221                 return ptl->ptl_mtables[0]; /* the only one */
00222 
00223         /* if it's a unique portal, return match-table hashed by NID */
00224         return lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) ?
00225                ptl->ptl_mtables[lnet_cpt_of_nid(id.nid)] : NULL;
00226 }
00227 
00228 struct lnet_match_table *
00229 lnet_mt_of_attach(unsigned int index, lnet_process_id_t id,
00230                   __u64 mbits, __u64 ignore_bits, lnet_ins_pos_t pos)
00231 {
00232         struct lnet_portal      *ptl;
00233         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00234 
00235         /* NB: called w/o lock */
00236         LASSERT(index < the_lnet.ln_nportals);
00237 
00238         if (!lnet_ptl_match_type(index, id, mbits, ignore_bits))
00239                 return NULL;
00240 
00241         ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[index];
00242 
00243         mtable = lnet_match2mt(ptl, id, mbits);
00244         if (mtable != NULL) /* unique portal or only one match-table */
00245                 return mtable;
00246 
00247         /* it's a wildcard portal */
00248         switch (pos) {
00249         default:
00250                 return NULL;
00251         case LNET_INS_BEFORE:
00252         case LNET_INS_AFTER:
00253                 /* posted by no affinity thread, always hash to specific
00254                  * match-table to avoid buffer stealing which is heavy */
00255                 return ptl->ptl_mtables[ptl->ptl_index % LNET_CPT_NUMBER];
00256         case LNET_INS_LOCAL:
00257                 /* posted by cpu-affinity thread */
00258                 return ptl->ptl_mtables[lnet_cpt_current()];
00259         }
00260 }
00261 
00262 static struct lnet_match_table *
00263 lnet_mt_of_match(struct lnet_match_info *info, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00264 {
00265         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00266         struct lnet_portal      *ptl;
00267         unsigned int            nmaps;
00268         unsigned int            rotor;
00269         unsigned int            cpt;
00270         bool                    routed;
00271 
00272         /* NB: called w/o lock */
00273         LASSERT(info->mi_portal < the_lnet.ln_nportals);
00274         ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[info->mi_portal];
00275 
00276         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl) || lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl));
00277 
00278         mtable = lnet_match2mt(ptl, info->mi_id, info->mi_mbits);
00279         if (mtable != NULL)
00280                 return mtable;
00281 
00282         /* it's a wildcard portal */
00283         routed = LNET_NIDNET(msg->msg_hdr.src_nid) !=
00284                  LNET_NIDNET(msg->msg_hdr.dest_nid);
00285 
00286         if (portal_rotor == LNET_PTL_ROTOR_OFF ||
00287             (portal_rotor != LNET_PTL_ROTOR_ON && !routed)) {
00288                 cpt = lnet_cpt_current();
00289                 if (ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt]->mt_enabled)
00290                         return ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00291         }
00292 
00293         rotor = ptl->ptl_rotor++; /* get round-robin factor */
00294         if (portal_rotor == LNET_PTL_ROTOR_HASH_RT && routed)
00295                 cpt = lnet_cpt_of_nid(msg->msg_hdr.src_nid);
00296         else
00297                 cpt = rotor % LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
00298 
00299         if (!ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt]->mt_enabled) {
00300                 /* is there any active entry for this portal? */
00301                 nmaps = ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps;
00302                 /* map to an active mtable to avoid heavy "stealing" */
00303                 if (nmaps != 0) {
00304                         /* NB: there is possibility that ptl_mt_maps is being
00305                          * changed because we are not under protection of
00306                          * lnet_ptl_lock, but it shouldn't hurt anything */
00307                         cpt = ptl->ptl_mt_maps[rotor % nmaps];
00308                 }
00309         }
00310 
00311         return ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00312 }
00313 
00314 static int
00315 lnet_mt_test_exhausted(struct lnet_match_table *mtable, int pos)
00316 {
00317         __u64   *bmap;
00318         int     i;
00319 
00320         if (!lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(the_lnet.ln_portals[mtable->mt_portal]))
00321                 return 0;
00322 
00323         if (pos < 0) { /* check all bits */
00324                 for (i = 0; i < LNET_MT_EXHAUSTED_BMAP; i++) {
00325                         if (mtable->mt_exhausted[i] != (__u64)(-1))
00326                                 return 0;
00327                 }
00328                 return 1;
00329         }
00330 
00331         LASSERT(pos <= LNET_MT_HASH_IGNORE);
00332         /* mtable::mt_mhash[pos] is marked as exhausted or not */
00333         bmap = &mtable->mt_exhausted[pos >> LNET_MT_BITS_U64];
00334         pos &= (1 << LNET_MT_BITS_U64) - 1;
00335 
00336         return ((*bmap) & (1ULL << pos)) != 0;
00337 }
00338 
00339 static void
00340 lnet_mt_set_exhausted(struct lnet_match_table *mtable, int pos, int exhausted)
00341 {
00342         __u64   *bmap;
00343 
00344         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(the_lnet.ln_portals[mtable->mt_portal]));
00345         LASSERT(pos <= LNET_MT_HASH_IGNORE);
00346 
00347         /* set mtable::mt_mhash[pos] as exhausted/non-exhausted */
00348         bmap = &mtable->mt_exhausted[pos >> LNET_MT_BITS_U64];
00349         pos &= (1 << LNET_MT_BITS_U64) - 1;
00350 
00351         if (!exhausted)
00352                 *bmap &= ~(1ULL << pos);
00353         else
00354                 *bmap |= 1ULL << pos;
00355 }
00356 
00357 struct list_head *
00358 lnet_mt_match_head(struct lnet_match_table *mtable,
00359                    lnet_process_id_t id, __u64 mbits)
00360 {
00361         struct lnet_portal *ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[mtable->mt_portal];
00362 
00363         if (lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl)) {
00364                 return &mtable->mt_mhash[mbits & LNET_MT_HASH_MASK];
00365         } else {
00366                 unsigned long hash = mbits + id.nid + id.pid;
00367 
00368                 LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl));
00369                 hash = hash_long(hash, LNET_MT_HASH_BITS);
00370                 return &mtable->mt_mhash[hash & LNET_MT_HASH_MASK];
00371         }
00372 }
00373 
00374 int
00375 lnet_mt_match_md(struct lnet_match_table *mtable,
00376                  struct lnet_match_info *info, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00377 {
00378         struct list_head        *head;
00379         lnet_me_t               *me;
00380         lnet_me_t               *tmp;
00381         int                     exhausted = 0;
00382         int                     rc;
00383 
00384         /* any ME with ignore bits? */
00385         if (!list_empty(&mtable->mt_mhash[LNET_MT_HASH_IGNORE]))
00386                 head = &mtable->mt_mhash[LNET_MT_HASH_IGNORE];
00387         else
00388                 head = lnet_mt_match_head(mtable, info->mi_id, info->mi_mbits);
00389  again:
00390         /* NB: only wildcard portal needs to return LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED */
00391         if (lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(the_lnet.ln_portals[mtable->mt_portal]))
00392                 exhausted = LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED;
00393 
00394         list_for_each_entry_safe(me, tmp, head, me_list) {
00395                 /* ME attached but MD not attached yet */
00396                 if (me->me_md == NULL)
00397                         continue;
00398 
00399                 LASSERT(me == me->me_md->md_me);
00400 
00401                 rc = lnet_try_match_md(me->me_md, info, msg);
00402                 if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED) == 0)
00403                         exhausted = 0; /* mlist is not empty */
00404 
00405                 if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH) != 0) {
00406                         /* don't return EXHAUSTED bit because we don't know
00407                          * whether the mlist is empty or not */
00408                         return rc & ~LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED;
00409                 }
00410         }
00411 
00412         if (exhausted == LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED) { /* @head is exhausted */
00413                 lnet_mt_set_exhausted(mtable, head - mtable->mt_mhash, 1);
00414                 if (!lnet_mt_test_exhausted(mtable, -1))
00415                         exhausted = 0;
00416         }
00417 
00418         if (exhausted == 0 && head == &mtable->mt_mhash[LNET_MT_HASH_IGNORE]) {
00419                 head = lnet_mt_match_head(mtable, info->mi_id, info->mi_mbits);
00420                 goto again; /* re-check MEs w/o ignore-bits */
00421         }
00422 
00423         if (info->mi_opc == LNET_MD_OP_GET ||
00424             !lnet_ptl_is_lazy(the_lnet.ln_portals[info->mi_portal]))
00425                 return LNET_MATCHMD_DROP | exhausted;
00426 
00427         return LNET_MATCHMD_NONE | exhausted;
00428 }
00429 
00430 static int
00431 lnet_ptl_match_early(struct lnet_portal *ptl, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00432 {
00433         int     rc;
00434 
00435         /* message arrived before any buffer posting on this portal,
00436          * simply delay or drop this message */
00437         if (likely(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl) || lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl)))
00438                 return 0;
00439 
00440         lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00441         /* check it again with hold of lock */
00442         if (lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl) || lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl)) {
00443                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00444                 return 0;
00445         }
00446 
00447         if (lnet_ptl_is_lazy(ptl)) {
00448                 if (msg->msg_rx_ready_delay) {
00449                         msg->msg_rx_delayed = 1;
00450                         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list,
00451                                       &ptl->ptl_msg_delayed);
00452                 }
00453                 rc = LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00454         } else {
00455                 rc = LNET_MATCHMD_DROP;
00456         }
00457 
00458         lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00459         return rc;
00460 }
00461 
00462 static int
00463 lnet_ptl_match_delay(struct lnet_portal *ptl,
00464                      struct lnet_match_info *info, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00465 {
00466         int     first = ptl->ptl_mt_maps[0]; /* read w/o lock */
00467         int     rc = 0;
00468         int     i;
00469 
00470         /*
00471          * Steal buffer from other CPTs, and delay msg if nothing to
00472          * steal.  This function is more expensive than a regular
00473          * match, but we don't expect it can happen a lot. The return
00474          * code contains one of LNET_MATCHMD_OK, LNET_MATCHMD_DROP, or
00475          * LNET_MATCHMD_NONE.
00476          */
00477         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl));
00478 
00479         for (i = 0; i < LNET_CPT_NUMBER; i++) {
00480                 struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00481                 int                     cpt;
00482 
00483                 cpt = (first + i) % LNET_CPT_NUMBER;
00484                 mtable = ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00485                 if (i != 0 && i != LNET_CPT_NUMBER - 1 && !mtable->mt_enabled)
00486                         continue;
00487 
00488                 lnet_res_lock(cpt);
00489                 lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00490 
00491                 if (i == 0) {
00492                         /* The first try, add to stealing list. */
00493                         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list,
00494                                       &ptl->ptl_msg_stealing);
00495                 }
00496 
00497                 if (!list_empty(&msg->msg_list)) {
00498                         /* On stealing list. */
00499                         rc = lnet_mt_match_md(mtable, info, msg);
00500 
00501                         if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED) != 0 &&
00502                             mtable->mt_enabled)
00503                                 lnet_ptl_disable_mt(ptl, cpt);
00504 
00505                         if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH) != 0) {
00506                                 /* Match found, remove from stealing list. */
00507                                 list_del_init(&msg->msg_list);
00508                         } else if (i == LNET_CPT_NUMBER - 1 || /* (1) */
00509                                    ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps == 0 ||   /* (2) */
00510                                    (ptl->ptl_mt_nmaps == 1 &&  /* (3) */
00511                                     ptl->ptl_mt_maps[0] == cpt)) {
00512                                 /*
00513                                  * No match found, and this is either
00514                                  * (1) the last cpt to check, or
00515                                  * (2) there is no active cpt, or
00516                                  * (3) this is the only active cpt.
00517                                  * There is nothing to steal: delay or
00518                                  * drop the message.
00519                                  */
00520                                 list_del_init(&msg->msg_list);
00521 
00522                                 if (lnet_ptl_is_lazy(ptl)) {
00523                                         msg->msg_rx_delayed = 1;
00524                                         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list,
00525                                                       &ptl->ptl_msg_delayed);
00526                                         rc = LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00527                                 } else {
00528                                         rc = LNET_MATCHMD_DROP;
00529                                 }
00530                         } else {
00531                                 /* Do another iteration. */
00532                                 rc = 0;
00533                         }
00534                 } else {
00535                         /*
00536                          * No longer on stealing list: another thread
00537                          * matched the message in lnet_ptl_attach_md().
00538                          * We are now expected to handle the message.
00539                          */
00540                         rc = msg->msg_md == NULL ?
00541                                 LNET_MATCHMD_DROP : LNET_MATCHMD_OK;
00542                 }
00543 
00544                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00545                 lnet_res_unlock(cpt);
00546 
00547                 /*
00548                  * Note that test (1) above ensures that we always
00549                  * exit the loop through this break statement.
00550                  *
00551                  * LNET_MATCHMD_NONE means msg was added to the
00552                  * delayed queue, and we may no longer reference it
00553                  * after lnet_ptl_unlock() and lnet_res_unlock().
00554                  */
00555                 if (rc & (LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH | LNET_MATCHMD_NONE))
00556                         break;
00557         }
00558 
00559         return rc;
00560 }
00561 
00562 int
00563 lnet_ptl_match_md(struct lnet_match_info *info, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00564 {
00565         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00566         struct lnet_portal      *ptl;
00567         int                     rc;
00568 
00569         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Request from %s of length %d into portal %d "
00570                "MB="LPX64"\n", libcfs_id2str(info->mi_id),
00571                info->mi_rlength, info->mi_portal, info->mi_mbits);
00572 
00573         if (info->mi_portal >= the_lnet.ln_nportals) {
00574                 CERROR("Invalid portal %d not in [0-%d]\n",
00575                        info->mi_portal, the_lnet.ln_nportals);
00576                 return LNET_MATCHMD_DROP;
00577         }
00578 
00579         ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[info->mi_portal];
00580         rc = lnet_ptl_match_early(ptl, msg);
00581         if (rc != 0) /* matched or delayed early message */
00582                 return rc;
00583 
00584         mtable = lnet_mt_of_match(info, msg);
00585         lnet_res_lock(mtable->mt_cpt);
00586 
00587         if (the_lnet.ln_shutdown) {
00588                 rc = LNET_MATCHMD_DROP;
00589                 goto out1;
00590         }
00591 
00592         rc = lnet_mt_match_md(mtable, info, msg);
00593         if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED) != 0 && mtable->mt_enabled) {
00594                 lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00595                 lnet_ptl_disable_mt(ptl, mtable->mt_cpt);
00596                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00597         }
00598 
00599         if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH) != 0)    /* matched or dropping */
00600                 goto out1;
00601 
00602         if (!msg->msg_rx_ready_delay)
00603                 goto out1;
00604 
00605         LASSERT(lnet_ptl_is_lazy(ptl));
00606         LASSERT(!msg->msg_rx_delayed);
00607 
00608         /* NB: we don't expect "delay" can happen a lot */
00609         if (lnet_ptl_is_unique(ptl) || LNET_CPT_NUMBER == 1) {
00610                 lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00611 
00612                 msg->msg_rx_delayed = 1;
00613                 list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list, &ptl->ptl_msg_delayed);
00614 
00615                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00616                 lnet_res_unlock(mtable->mt_cpt);
00617                 rc = LNET_MATCHMD_NONE;
00618         } else  {
00619                 lnet_res_unlock(mtable->mt_cpt);
00620                 rc = lnet_ptl_match_delay(ptl, info, msg);
00621         }
00622 
00623         /* LNET_MATCHMD_NONE means msg was added to the delay queue */
00624         if (rc & LNET_MATCHMD_NONE) {
00625                 CDEBUG(D_NET,
00626                        "Delaying %s from %s ptl %d MB "LPX64" off %d len %d\n",
00627                        info->mi_opc == LNET_MD_OP_PUT ? "PUT" : "GET",
00628                        libcfs_id2str(info->mi_id), info->mi_portal,
00629                        info->mi_mbits, info->mi_roffset, info->mi_rlength);
00630         }
00631         goto out0;
00632  out1:
00633         lnet_res_unlock(mtable->mt_cpt);
00634  out0:
00635         /* EXHAUSTED bit is only meaningful for internal functions */
00636         return rc & ~LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED;
00637 }
00638 
00639 void
00640 lnet_ptl_detach_md(lnet_me_t *me, lnet_libmd_t *md)
00641 {
00642         LASSERT(me->me_md == md && md->md_me == me);
00643 
00644         me->me_md = NULL;
00645         md->md_me = NULL;
00646 }
00647 
00648 /* called with lnet_res_lock held */
00649 void
00650 lnet_ptl_attach_md(lnet_me_t *me, lnet_libmd_t *md,
00651                    struct list_head *matches, struct list_head *drops)
00652 {
00653         struct lnet_portal      *ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[me->me_portal];
00654         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00655         struct list_head        *head;
00656         lnet_msg_t              *tmp;
00657         lnet_msg_t              *msg;
00658         int                     exhausted = 0;
00659         int                     cpt;
00660 
00661         LASSERT(md->md_refcount == 0); /* a brand new MD */
00662 
00663         me->me_md = md;
00664         md->md_me = me;
00665 
00666         cpt = lnet_cpt_of_cookie(md->md_lh.lh_cookie);
00667         mtable = ptl->ptl_mtables[cpt];
00668 
00669         if (list_empty(&ptl->ptl_msg_stealing) &&
00670             list_empty(&ptl->ptl_msg_delayed) &&
00671             !lnet_mt_test_exhausted(mtable, me->me_pos))
00672                 return;
00673 
00674         lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00675         head = &ptl->ptl_msg_stealing;
00676  again:
00677         list_for_each_entry_safe(msg, tmp, head, msg_list) {
00678                 struct lnet_match_info  info;
00679                 lnet_hdr_t              *hdr;
00680                 int                     rc;
00681 
00682                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rx_delayed || head == &ptl->ptl_msg_stealing);
00683 
00684                 hdr   = &msg->msg_hdr;
00685                 info.mi_id.nid  = hdr->src_nid;
00686                 info.mi_id.pid  = hdr->src_pid;
00687                 info.mi_opc     = LNET_MD_OP_PUT;
00688                 info.mi_portal  = hdr->msg.put.ptl_index;
00689                 info.mi_rlength = hdr->payload_length;
00690                 info.mi_roffset = hdr->msg.put.offset;
00691                 info.mi_mbits   = hdr->msg.put.match_bits;
00692 
00693                 rc = lnet_try_match_md(md, &info, msg);
00694 
00695                 exhausted = (rc & LNET_MATCHMD_EXHAUSTED) != 0;
00696                 if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_NONE) != 0) {
00697                         if (exhausted)
00698                                 break;
00699                         continue;
00700                 }
00701 
00702                 /* Hurrah! This _is_ a match */
00703                 LASSERT((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_FINISH) != 0);
00704                 list_del_init(&msg->msg_list);
00705 
00706                 if (head == &ptl->ptl_msg_stealing) {
00707                         if (exhausted)
00708                                 break;
00709                         /* stealing thread will handle the message */
00710                         continue;
00711                 }
00712 
00713                 if ((rc & LNET_MATCHMD_OK) != 0) {
00714                         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list, matches);
00715 
00716                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Resuming delayed PUT from %s portal %d "
00717                                "match "LPU64" offset %d length %d.\n",
00718                                libcfs_id2str(info.mi_id),
00719                                info.mi_portal, info.mi_mbits,
00720                                info.mi_roffset, info.mi_rlength);
00721                 } else {
00722                         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list, drops);
00723                 }
00724 
00725                 if (exhausted)
00726                         break;
00727         }
00728 
00729         if (!exhausted && head == &ptl->ptl_msg_stealing) {
00730                 head = &ptl->ptl_msg_delayed;
00731                 goto again;
00732         }
00733 
00734         if (lnet_ptl_is_wildcard(ptl) && !exhausted) {
00735                 lnet_mt_set_exhausted(mtable, me->me_pos, 0);
00736                 if (!mtable->mt_enabled)
00737                         lnet_ptl_enable_mt(ptl, cpt);
00738         }
00739 
00740         lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00741 }
00742 
00743 static void
00744 lnet_ptl_cleanup(struct lnet_portal *ptl)
00745 {
00746         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00747         int                     i;
00748 
00749         if (ptl->ptl_mtables == NULL) /* uninitialized portal */
00750                 return;
00751 
00752         LASSERT(list_empty(&ptl->ptl_msg_delayed));
00753         LASSERT(list_empty(&ptl->ptl_msg_stealing));
00754         cfs_percpt_for_each(mtable, i, ptl->ptl_mtables) {
00755                 struct list_head *mhash;
00756                 lnet_me_t        *me;
00757                 int               j;
00758 
00759                 if (mtable->mt_mhash == NULL) /* uninitialized match-table */
00760                         continue;
00761 
00762                 mhash = mtable->mt_mhash;
00763                 /* cleanup ME */
00764                 for (j = 0; j < LNET_MT_HASH_SIZE + 1; j++) {
00765                         while (!list_empty(&mhash[j])) {
00766                                 me = list_entry(mhash[j].next,
00767                                                 lnet_me_t, me_list);
00768                                 CERROR("Active ME %p on exit\n", me);
00769                                 list_del(&me->me_list);
00770                                 lnet_me_free(me);
00771                         }
00772                 }
00773                 /* the extra entry is for MEs with ignore bits */
00774                 LIBCFS_FREE(mhash, sizeof(*mhash) * (LNET_MT_HASH_SIZE + 1));
00775         }
00776 
00777         cfs_percpt_free(ptl->ptl_mtables);
00778         ptl->ptl_mtables = NULL;
00779 }
00780 
00781 static int
00782 lnet_ptl_setup(struct lnet_portal *ptl, int index)
00783 {
00784         struct lnet_match_table *mtable;
00785         struct list_head        *mhash;
00786         int                     i;
00787         int                     j;
00788 
00789         ptl->ptl_mtables = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00790                                             sizeof(struct lnet_match_table));
00791         if (ptl->ptl_mtables == NULL) {
00792                 CERROR("Failed to create match table for portal %d\n", index);
00793                 return -ENOMEM;
00794         }
00795 
00796         ptl->ptl_index = index;
00797         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ptl->ptl_msg_delayed);
00798         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ptl->ptl_msg_stealing);
00799         spin_lock_init(&ptl->ptl_lock);
00800         cfs_percpt_for_each(mtable, i, ptl->ptl_mtables) {
00801                 /* the extra entry is for MEs with ignore bits */
00802                 LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(mhash, lnet_cpt_table(), i,
00803                                  sizeof(*mhash) * (LNET_MT_HASH_SIZE + 1));
00804                 if (mhash == NULL) {
00805                         CERROR("Failed to create match hash for portal %d\n",
00806                                index);
00807                         goto failed;
00808                 }
00809 
00810                 memset(&mtable->mt_exhausted[0], -1,
00811                        sizeof(mtable->mt_exhausted[0]) *
00812                        LNET_MT_EXHAUSTED_BMAP);
00813                 mtable->mt_mhash = mhash;
00814                 for (j = 0; j < LNET_MT_HASH_SIZE + 1; j++)
00815                         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mhash[j]);
00816 
00817                 mtable->mt_portal = index;
00818                 mtable->mt_cpt = i;
00819         }
00820 
00821         return 0;
00822  failed:
00823         lnet_ptl_cleanup(ptl);
00824         return -ENOMEM;
00825 }
00826 
00827 void
00828 lnet_portals_destroy(void)
00829 {
00830         int     i;
00831 
00832         if (the_lnet.ln_portals == NULL)
00833                 return;
00834 
00835         for (i = 0; i < the_lnet.ln_nportals; i++)
00836                 lnet_ptl_cleanup(the_lnet.ln_portals[i]);
00837 
00838         cfs_array_free(the_lnet.ln_portals);
00839         the_lnet.ln_portals = NULL;
00840 }
00841 
00842 int
00843 lnet_portals_create(void)
00844 {
00845         int     size;
00846         int     i;
00847 
00848         size = offsetof(struct lnet_portal, ptl_mt_maps[LNET_CPT_NUMBER]);
00849 
00850         the_lnet.ln_nportals = MAX_PORTALS;
00851         the_lnet.ln_portals = cfs_array_alloc(the_lnet.ln_nportals, size);
00852         if (the_lnet.ln_portals == NULL) {
00853                 CERROR("Failed to allocate portals table\n");
00854                 return -ENOMEM;
00855         }
00856 
00857         for (i = 0; i < the_lnet.ln_nportals; i++) {
00858                 if (lnet_ptl_setup(the_lnet.ln_portals[i], i)) {
00859                         lnet_portals_destroy();
00860                         return -ENOMEM;
00861                 }
00862         }
00863 
00864         return 0;
00865 }
00866 
00895 int
00896 LNetSetLazyPortal(int portal)
00897 {
00898         struct lnet_portal *ptl;
00899 
00900         if (portal < 0 || portal >= the_lnet.ln_nportals)
00901                 return -EINVAL;
00902 
00903         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Setting portal %d lazy\n", portal);
00904         ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[portal];
00905 
00906         lnet_res_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00907         lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00908 
00909         lnet_ptl_setopt(ptl, LNET_PTL_LAZY);
00910 
00911         lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00912         lnet_res_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00913 
00914         return 0;
00915 }
00916 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetSetLazyPortal);
00917 
00918 int
00919 lnet_clear_lazy_portal(struct lnet_ni *ni, int portal, char *reason)
00920 {
00921         struct lnet_portal      *ptl;
00922         struct list_head        zombies = LIST_HEAD_INIT(zombies);
00923 
00924         if (portal < 0 || portal >= the_lnet.ln_nportals)
00925                 return -EINVAL;
00926 
00927         ptl = the_lnet.ln_portals[portal];
00928 
00929         lnet_res_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00930         lnet_ptl_lock(ptl);
00931 
00932         if (!lnet_ptl_is_lazy(ptl)) {
00933                 lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00934                 lnet_res_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00935                 return 0;
00936         }
00937 
00938         if (ni != NULL) {
00939                 struct lnet_msg *msg, *tmp;
00940 
00941                 /* grab all messages which are on the NI passed in */
00942                 list_for_each_entry_safe(msg, tmp, &ptl->ptl_msg_delayed,
00943                                          msg_list) {
00944                         if (msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_ni == ni)
00945                                 list_move(&msg->msg_list, &zombies);
00946                 }
00947         } else {
00948                 if (the_lnet.ln_shutdown)
00949                         CWARN("Active lazy portal %d on exit\n", portal);
00950                 else
00951                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "clearing portal %d lazy\n", portal);
00952 
00953                 /* grab all the blocked messages atomically */
00954                 list_splice_init(&ptl->ptl_msg_delayed, &zombies);
00955 
00956                 lnet_ptl_unsetopt(ptl, LNET_PTL_LAZY);
00957         }
00958 
00959         lnet_ptl_unlock(ptl);
00960         lnet_res_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00961 
00962         lnet_drop_delayed_msg_list(&zombies, reason);
00963 
00964         return 0;
00965 }
00966 
00976 int
00977 LNetClearLazyPortal(int portal)
00978 {
00979         return lnet_clear_lazy_portal(NULL, portal,
00980                                       "Clearing lazy portal attr");
00981 }
00982 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetClearLazyPortal);
